sentences.en: All it took was a word here, a word there, to convince him that he was a nothing.
sentences.cn: 所要做的是处处提醒他,使他相信自己并非什么大人物.

sentences.en: Although I soon convinced him of my innocence, I think he still has serious doubts about my sanity.
sentences.cn: 尽管我很快就使他相信我是清白的，但是他还是非常怀疑我精神是否正常。

sentences.en: He tried to convince them of the safety of travelling by airplane.
sentences.cn: 他想要使他们相信乘飞机旅行的安全.

sentences.en: Her arguments didn’t convince everyone, but changes were made.
sentences.cn: 她的论点不能说服每个人，但还是引起了一些变化。

sentences.en: Her parents cannot convince her that she has made a wrong decision.
sentences.cn: 她父母亲无法说服她,让她相信她的决定错了.

sentences.en: I have given over trying to convince him.
sentences.cn: 我已经不再试图说服他了.

sentences.en: I'm not going to believe it myself, never mind convince anyone else.
sentences.cn: 我自己都不会相信，更别提说服别人了。

sentences.en: It is better to convince by argument than seduce by example.
sentences.cn: 以理说服强于举例诱导。

sentences.en: It requires a lot of talking to convince him.
It's hopeless trying to convince her.
Neither of them could convince the other.
Only by presenting facts and reasoning things out can we convince people.
sentences.cn: 摆事实、讲道理,才能让人服气.

sentences.en: Only by reasoning can we convince people completely.
sentences.cn: 只有以理服人,才能使人心悦诚服.

sentences.en: Smith tries to convince them that he can hack it as a police chief.
sentences.cn: 史密斯试图让他们相信，作为警长自己能应付得了。

sentences.en: They argue heatedly, but neither could convince the other.
sentences.cn: 他们争论得很激烈, 但是谁也说服不了谁.

sentences.en: We were able to convince the students of the need for wider reading.
sentences.cn: 我们能让学生们认识到广泛的阅读的必要性.

sentences.en: Your argument is too weak to convince me.
sentences.cn: 你的论点太薄弱了，说服不了我。

words.tran_cn: 令人信服的；有说服力的
令人信服地；有说服力地
使确信（convince的过去分词）；说服
使相信；使明白（convince的现在分词）

trans.tran_en: to make someone feel certain that something is true

trans.tran_cn: 使确信， 使信服， 说服
trans.tran_en: to make someone feel certain that something is true
